data.name: Bibliography
desc: specifies service of a Bibliography field master.

types.name: SortKeys
desc: determines the sorting of the bibliography entries in a bibliography index.
This property is used if the property IsSortByPosition is not set. Each contained element of the sequence is a sequence of the following two properties:

properties.name: BracketAfter
desc: determines the closing bracket used to display the bibliography text fields.

properties.name: BracketBefore
desc: determines the opening bracket used to display the bibliography text fields.

properties.name: IsNumberEntries
desc: determines whether the bibliography text fields are numbered.
If FALSE the short name of the bibliography entry is displayed instead.

properties.name: IsSortByPosition
desc: determines whether the bibliography entries in a bibliography index are sorted by the document position.
If FALSE the SortKey property determines the sorting of the entries.

properties.name: Locale
desc: contains the locale of the field master

properties.name: SortAlgorithm
desc: contains the name of the sort algorithm that is used to sort the text fields.
